Text:
Am I the only one who downloaded this and it arrived with no file extension?

(Using uTorrent.)

Thanks VTV for the all great upload, its great that you are uploading mp4, I can watch it with appletv. Will it be possible for you to use the naming pattern like this from TVDB - http://thetvdb.com/?tab=season&seriesid=71256&seasonid=475883&lid=7, The.Daily.Show.with.Jon Stewart.S17E148.Kirsten Gillibrand.2012-09-05, so that the identify - http://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/33814/identifywould easily recognize it!! Thanks.
